statements: SELECT * FROM user_engagement_metrics;
SELECT user_id, engagement_score FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_score > 50;
SELECT user_id, ad_placement FROM user_engagement_metrics ORDER BY ad_placement DESC;
SELECT user_id, engagement_score, budget FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE budget < 1000;
SELECT AVG(engagement_score) AS average_score FROM user_engagement_metrics;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_score > 50 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, engagement_score, ad_placement FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE budget > 1000 ORDER BY engagement_score ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE ad_placement LIKE '%social%' OR ad_placement LIKE '%search%' ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT user_id, budget FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE engagement_score BETWEEN 30 AND 70 ORDER BY budget ASC, engagement_score DESC;
SELECT user_id, ad_placement, engagement_score FROM user_engagement_metrics WHERE budget < 5000 ORDER BY ad_placement ASC, user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email, last_login_date FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-06-01' AND '2021-07-01';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY last_login_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%smith%' ORDER BY registration_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-07-01' ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE budget > 1000 ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, last_login_date FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY last_login_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT ad_name, ad_cost FROM ads WHERE ad_cost > 100;
SELECT engagement_id, user_id, ad_id FROM user_engagement WHERE engagement_type = 'click';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, ad_cost FROM ads WHERE ad_cost > 100;
SELECT user_id, engagement_type, engagement_time FROM user_engagement ORDER BY engagement_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM users INNER JOIN user_engagement ON users.user_id = user_engagement.user_id;
SELECT ad_name, COUNT(*) AS engagement_count FROM user_engagement INNER JOIN ads ON user_engagement.ad_id = ads.ad_id GROUP BY ad_name ORDER BY engagement_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE signup_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT ad_name, ad_type, ad_cost FROM ads WHERE ad_end_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT user_id, ad_id, engagement_type FROM engagements ORDER BY engagement_date DESC;
SELECT budget_id, ad_id, budget_amount, budget_start_date FROM budgets WHERE budget_amount > 5000;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE signup_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT ad_name, ad_type, ad_cost FROM ads WHERE ad_cost > 1000
SELECT user_name, email, engagement_type FROM users JOIN engagements ON users.user_id = engagements.user_id
SELECT * FROM budgets WHERE budget_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000
SELECT u.user_name, e.engagement_type, a.ad_name FROM users u JOIN engagements e ON u.user_id = e.user_id JOIN ads a ON e.ad_id = a.ad_id
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT username, gender FROM users WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM ad_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM ad_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY join_date DESC, username ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM ad_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT ad_id, click_date, device_type FROM ad_clicks ORDER BY click_date DESC, ad_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT ad_id, impression_date, impression_count FROM ad_impressions WHERE impression_count > 100 ORDER BY impression_date ASC;
